objects.description: [Bad Rabbit](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0005) ransomware spreads through drive-by attacks where insecure websites are compromised. While the target is visiting a legitimate website, a malware dropper is being downloaded from the threat actor’s infrastructure.(Citation: Kaspersky Bad Rabbit Oct 2017)

external_references.description: Orkhan Mamedov, Fedor Sinitsyn, Anton Ivanov. (2017, October 27). Bad Rabbit Ransomware. Retrieved October 27, 2019.
